raw_comment: have you wondered why young men/women are never outside as much , most of us young women/men that i see use text and they facetime instead of walking around and talking. I wonder why this is, is it because of the use of phones or of social in anxieity. This effects my community because when i am downtown or anywhere i never see kids my age or if i do they are on their phones we need yo put our phones down and go outside.
ace_sentences: I wonder why young men are not outside very much.
I wonder why young women are not outside very much.
Many young women use text messages.
Many young men use text messages.
Many young women use FaceTime instead of walking around and talking.
Many young men use FaceTime instead of walking around and talking.
This may be because of the use of phones.
This may be because of social anxiety.
When I am downtown, I never see kids of my age.
If I see kids of my age, then they are on their phones.
We need to put our phones down.
